<!-- Set PArameters Module -->
<!-- Set the chnkPrefix to make all chunks unique in the overall folder -->
```{r partC_alignment_summary_init, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
chnkPrefix <- "C3.alignment."
VersionPdfExt <- VersionPdfExt <- paste0(".",chnkPrefix,"V", gsub("-", "", Sys.Date()), ".pdf")

```


## Read Alignment
```{r alignment_dat, echo=F, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, result="asis"}

chnkVec <- as.vector(NULL, mode = "character")

FN  <- paste0(Obio@parameterList$localWorkDir, list.files(Obio@parameterList$localWorkDir)[grep("documentationShell.script.sh", list.files(Obio@parameterList$localWorkDir))])

if (length(FN) > 0){
    dfDocu <- read.delim(FN, header=F, sep="\t")
    
    NewChnk <- paste0(
        "\n```{r Alignment, results='asis', echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE, warning=FALSE}\n",
        " \n"
    )
    
    chnkVec <- c(
        chnkVec,
        NewChnk
    )
    
    for (i in 1:nrow(dfDocu)){
        
        NewChnk <- paste0(
            dfDocu[i,1], 
            " \n "
        )
        chnkVec <- c(
            chnkVec,
            NewChnk
        )
    }
    
    NewChnk <- "\n\n\n```\n"
    
    chnkVec <- c(
        chnkVec,
        NewChnk
    ) 
}
```

```{r print bash script, echo=F, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, results="asis"}
    cat(paste(knitr::knit(text = chnkVec, quiet = T), collapse = '\n'))
```
